title: These are OBJECTIVELY great! - Bose QuietComfort Buds 2
description: Pitaka is giving 15% off iPhone 14 cases to the first 100 people to go to:  or  and use code ShortCircuit15.  Pitakas Black Friday Sale:   Resident earbud connoisseur James is here with the help of Labs to take a look at the new Bose QuietComfort Buds to see if Bose can take the crown for Best TWS buds or if Apple is still undefeated.  Thanks to Headphones.com for providing these earbuds, check out Headphones.com at   Buy a pair of Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 oof.mp3 0:18 Unboxing 1:03 Putting them in and calibration 1:35 Case impressions 1:50 Using the app 2:50 Sponsor - Pitaka 3:29 Tap controls 3:51 Different ANC modes 6:30 Audio testing from Labs 10:45 Battery life and pricing 11:32 Outro

And the reason for that is that music isn't of equal loudness as a song plays.
